item.title: Workflow for my daily data work
item.description: Need to fix markdown to Rmarkdown, otherwise you can’t write R code here…. okay, use this package DiagrammeR to draw flowcharts in R: https://datascienceplus.com/how-to-build-a-simple-flowchart-with-r-diagrammer-package/ new data –> identify key variables and check duplication (if pass) —> do pre-process (if not pass) —> pick a sample of dataset/examples to see what cause duplication before presenting to others, take a short coffee break and come back to check the final data again with fresh eyes.
